scripts.analysis:psalm: tools/composer run psalm && tools/composer run psalm-taint-analysis
scripts.check:code: tools/composer run parallel-lint && concurrently -g --timings yarn:check:size yarn:lint yarn:analysis-minimal
scripts.clean:temp: rm -rf test-results/ && find tmp/ -maxdepth 1 -type f \( -name '*.html' -o -name '*.json' ! -name assets-sizes.json \) -delete && find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name '*.html' -delete
scripts.docker:images:include: if strings "$(command -v sed)" | grep -q -F -m 1 "FreeBSD"; then sed -i '' '/^src\/images$/d' .dockerignore; else sed -i '/^src\/images$/d' .dockerignore; fi
scripts.generate:reports:background-tests-fonts_: docker exec pccd-web php scripts/background_tests.php fonts_urls > tmp/test_fonts_URL.txt
scripts.generate:reports:background-tests-html_e: docker exec pccd-web php scripts/background_tests.php html_escape_and_link_urls > tmp/test_html_escape_and_link_urls.txt
scripts.generate:reports:background-tests-imatge: docker exec pccd-web php scripts/background_tests.php imatges_links > tmp/test_imatges_URL_ENLLAC.txt
docker exec pccd-web php scripts/background_tests.php imatges_urls > tmp/test_imatges_URL_IMATGE.txt
docker exec pccd-web php scripts/background_tests.php imatges_no_existents > tmp/test_imatges_no_existents.txt
docker exec pccd-web php scripts/background_tests.php imatges_duplicades > tmp/test_imatges_duplicades.txt
docker exec pccd-web php scripts/background_tests.php imatges_no_referenciades > tmp/test_imatges_no_referenciades.txt
scripts.generate:reports:background-tests-llibre: docker exec pccd-web php scripts/background_tests.php llibres_urls > tmp/test_llibres_URL.txt
scripts.generate:reports:background-tests-paremi: docker exec pccd-web php scripts/background_tests.php paremiotipus_repetits 0 10000 > tmp/test_tmp_repetits_1.txt
docker exec pccd-web php scripts/background_tests.php paremiotipus_repetits 10000 25000 > tmp/test_tmp_repetits_2.txt
docker exec pccd-web php scripts/background_tests.php paremiotipus_repetits 25000 > tmp/test_tmp_repetits_3.txt
scripts.generate:reports:sinonims: docker exec pccd-web php scripts/sinonims-export/app.php > scripts/sinonims-export/sinonims_strict.txt 2> scripts/sinonims-export/sinonims.txt
scripts.lint:shellcheck: for file in $(find scripts -type f -name '*.sh' -not -name '*.generated.sh'); do shellcheck "$file" || exit 1; done
scripts.lint:shfmt: for file in $(find scripts -type f -name '*.sh' -not -name '*.generated.sh'); do shfmt --list --diff --case-indent --space-redirects --simplify --indent 4 "$file" || exit 1; done
scripts.postinstall: yes | tools/phive install --force-accept-unsigned && tools/composer install && npx playwright install
scripts.prepare:deploy: yarn run export:db && yarn run refresh:test-data && yarn run test && yarn run export:commonvoice && yarn run generate:reports && yarn run docker:images:ignore
scripts.test: yarn run test:e2e && yarn run test:unit && yarn run test:html-quality && yarn run test:core-vitals && yarn run check:certificate && yarn run check:certificate:origin
